Other Students Help

‘The study group really helped improve my confidence’

‘I decided to start the study group. I didn’t care whether others thought I was a loser or whether no-one joined. I’m too old to worry about things like that. I did it because I knew it would help me, and maybe others as well.’
(student)

How can other students help?

Even if you want to work alone there may be advantages to linking up with others.

How might other students help you?

What are the advantages in getting to know other students on your course?
